page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Many local people travel some distance to work (20% of those in work go more than ten miles).Some of those employed locally (35% of those in work) find employment at the works of {The North Devon Clay Company},with the garage and coach firm{Agrimotors}or with {The Clinton Estate}.
Occupations carried on in{Merton} continuously for the last 100 years include those of estate employee, farmer,postmaster/mistress and publican.Those of school-teacher and grocer have been followed in the village since the late 19th.century and those of antique-dealer and school-cook since more recent times.
Some former occupations no longer carried on in{Merton} are those of baker,butcher,maltster and thatcher.
